net.varkhan.base.management.monitor
Interface Monitor<V>

Type Parameters:
V - the type of the monitored value
All Known Subinterfaces:
MonitorAggregate<C,V,T>, MonitorBool, MonitorDouble, MonitorLong, MonitorParameter<P,V,T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
MonitorAverage, MonitorBoolWritable, MonitorContinuousAverage, MonitorCounter, MonitorDiscreteAverage, MonitorDoubleWritable, MonitorMilliTime, MonitorNanoTime, MonitorRange, MonitorStateCooldown, MonitorStateMinMax, MonitorTime, MonitorTimer, MonitorValue, MonitorWritable
public interface Monitor<V>

A monitored value.

A value point that reflects the state of a monitored process or resource.
